allocateBandwidth

public void allocateBandwidth(int Label,
                              int PHB,
                              int Class,
                              int Bandwidth)
This method allocates bandwidth for a specific traffic class

Parameters:
Label - MPLS label for the LSP
PHB - 0=EF, 1=AF, 2=BE
Class - AF classes 1,2,3,4. (0 if EF or BE)
Bandwidth - number of packets per time unit for this PHB/Class
Since:
1.0

Parameters:
newPacket - The packet that has just arrived at the router.
